subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The Liquigas team won a time trial and Vincenzo Nibali became the overall leader when the c returned to Italy after opening with three stages in the Netherlands.
snippet: The Liquigas team won a time trial and Vincenzo Nibali became the overall leader when the c returned to Italy after opening with three stages in the Netherlands.
